trans-unit.source: Press **Run** to start the app on a physical iOS device.
trans-unit.target: Press **Run** to start the app on a physical iOS device.

trans-unit.source: In the app, add a new item, such as _A new Mobile Services task_, to the todo list.
trans-unit.target: In the app, add a new item, such as _A new Mobile Services task_, to the todo list.

trans-unit.source: Verify that a notification is received.
trans-unit.target: Verify that a notification is received.

trans-unit.source: Additionally -- and optionally -- repeat the above steps on a different physical iOS device, once using the same log-in account and another time using a different log-in account.
trans-unit.target: Additionally -- and optionally -- repeat the above steps on a different physical iOS device, once using the same log-in account and another time using a different log-in account.

trans-unit.source: Verify that notifications are received only by devices authenticating with the same user account.
trans-unit.target: Verify that notifications are received only by devices authenticating with the same user account.
